author: markt
msg: No functional change. Add new classes that will be used to store the results of parsing web.xml and web-fragment.xml files. The merging and ordering rules can't be handled in the digester so we now have to parse to a temporary store and then merge.

msg: Return line number where the error occurs in the exception throwed, test if the format of the string is >= date pattern to avoid to accept 20090911-10:33:00 when the pattern is yyyyMMdd
